definition: secondary/auxiliary/deputy/assistant/vice-/abbr. for 副詞|副词 adverb/classifier for pairs, sets of things & facial expressions
to harness/to draw (a cart etc)/to drive/to pilot/to sail/to ride/your good self/prefixed word denoting respect (polite 敬辞)
to gallop/speedily/to proceed to/to pilot (ship, plane etc)/to sail

sentences.english: He took the controls last Sunday with co-pilot Kevin Rumens.
sentences.chinese: 上週日他與副駕駛員凱文駕駛火神進行8分鐘的表演。

sentences.english: He sat for his examinations as a co-pilot.
sentences.chinese: 他參加了飛機副駕駛員的考試。
